articles.author: Marc Caputo
articles.title: Zelensky's five moves that set off Trump - Axios
articles.description: Trump was so angry he was on the verge of withdrawing American military support from Ukraine.
articles.content: Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelensky angered Donald Trump so much during the peace talks with Russia that Trump was on the verge of withdrawing American military support from Ukraine, three U.S. offi… [+5418 chars]
